entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 10:10 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:10 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:10 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
